dublin_core.dcvalue: Reading epilepsy is a rare type of reflex epilepsy The seizures often comprise facial twitching and alexia but can be difficult to recognise and mistaken for non epileptic events Previous reports have identified reading of printed text television and computer screens as inducing seizures but hand held digital media have not been implicated We report a 44 year old woman with difficulty using the text message function of her mobile phone with a long background of unrecognised reading induced seizures
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-06T16:26:20Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2012-06-11
Journal of clinical neuroscience : official journal of the Neurosurgical Society of Australasia
"Txt"-induced seizures indicating reading epilepsy in the mobile phone age.
